articles.author: Thomas Jones, Kirk Bohls
articles.title: Live updates: Texas vs. Oklahoma softball Game 2 score, highlights from WCWS finals - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Texas softball takes on Oklahoma in Game 2 of their best-of-three WCWS championship series. Follow for scores, updates and highlights here:
articles.content: OKLAHOMA CITY Texas softball coach Mike White didn't mince words after his team dropped the first game in a best-of-three championship series 8-3 against Oklahoma Wednesday at the Women's College Wor… [+7517 chars]
